text: Pen-y-Lan is a Welsh place name: *Pen-y-lan, Ceredigion, a hamlet in west Wales *Penylan, a district of the city of Cardiff, Wales *Pen-y-Lan, a district of the city of Swansea *Pen-y-Lan Hall, a grade II listed mansion located near the village of Ruabon in Wrexham County Borough ==See also== * Penny Lane (disambiguation)
title: Pen-y-Lan
